item.description:
I am more than sorry to have to tell you that today's meet is canceled!

 

This is the beginning of school vacation for Holliston Meadows, and they have an overly full house of dogs staying there.  It turns out that they desperately need our meet room to exercise the more aggressive dogs and to use the conduit to the outside in that room.  Also there is a room nearby where dogs are staying that may not have been fully vaccinated, so they are concerned for us. 

 

This has never happened before, and they and I apologize profusely.  I will be in touch once I have reschheduled.  THOSE OF YOU WHO WERE PLANNING ON COMING PLEASE EMAIL ME TO LET ME KNOW THAT YOU HAVE RECEIVED THIS MESSAGE:  robinberry519@gmail.com.

 

Kim

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: TODAY'S DOG MEET AT THE HOLLISTON MEADOWS IS CANCELED!!!!!!
